title: Search for reporting guidelines

Reporting experiments in homeopathic basic research (REHBaR) - a detailed guideline for authors. Homeopathy. 2009;98(4):287-298.| |Language||English| |PubMed ID|| | Some reporting guidelines are also available in languages other than English. Find out more in our [Translations section](http://www.equator-network.org/library/translations-of-reporting-guidelines/). For information about Library scope and content, identification of reporting guidelines and inclusion/exclusion criteria please visit [About the Library](http://www.equator-network.org/library/about-the-library/). Visit our [Help page](http://www.equator-network.org/help/) for information about searching for reporting guidelines and for general information about using our website.
